about_the_game:
Return to the delightfully absurd world of Brownie's Adventure! Dive headfirst into a 1990s-style, point-and-click comedy that blends fantasy with the quirky charm of post-apocalyptic Northern Britain. Think classic 90s puzzle-solving, character-driven storytelling—but with more twists, surprises, and the occasional bizarre encounter. Chat with eccentric townsfolk, hold conversations with animated trees, and solve increasingly strange puzzles as you guide Brownie on his quest for redemption.

Your choices shape the game—altering dialogue, characters, and setting the stage for the inevitable (but thrilling!) final showdown. And if you get stuck, fear not! The hint system—based on hunting down elusive 'Kluberries'—is there to give you a nudge in the right direction.

Explore the crumbling ruins of Sheffield, sail through a bustling fantasy realm, and embark on an epic quest that spans both worlds. Will you survive the laugh-out-loud moments, dark humor, and fiendishly tricky puzzles to save both realities? Oh, and did I mention the magical laser battles with whippets and disgruntled climbers? No? Well, yeah... that’s in here too. Definitely worth a mention.





  • Set across two equally bizarre fantasy/post apocalyptic worlds
  • Classic 1990s point and click experience with a modern twist!
  • Estimated playtime: 5-7 hours (over 3 very unique acts)
  • Optional Kluberry™ hint system (because who doesn't love a hint?)
  • Live pixelated performance by 'The Santiago Kings' from Sheffield
  • A variety of unique and original puzzle ideas to tickle your brain
  • Multiple endings based on your choices (because your decisions matter)
  • 27 minutes of voice acted post-apocalyptic/Elvish radio!
  • Over 70 locations to discover!
  • More than 2200 hand-drawn sprites for that retro vibe
  • 50+ original musical compositions and soundscapes to set the mood
  • Enjoy magical combat, high seas adventures and even siege warfare
  • Only one joke about Barnsley



From a lowly second-class Pilchard press technician to an apprentice wizard—your journey begins at Piglumps Polytechnic, a not-so-prestigious school of magic. After narrowly escaping a high-stakes trial, you're thrust into a life of spellcraft and adventure. But when mysterious forces pull you from the magical realm to modern-day Sheffield on Earth, reality and magic collide in unexpected ways. As tensions build, you’ll return to face your greatest challenge yet: a final showdown with 'The Old Enemy.' The fate of both worlds rests in your hands—will you be ready?



Your choices will matter... Can you save the world(s)?

short_description: Join Brownie in a hilarious, darkly humorous, 1990s-inspired adventure! Solve puzzles, make choices, and explore a post-apocalyptic South Yorkshire. With player-driven decisions and alternate endings, can you stop the plot to take over the world? Relive the classic point-and-click magic!
